thread.title: Judge Dismisses Paul Manafort’s Civil Case Against Robert Mueller

author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Judge Dismisses Paul Manafort’s Civil Case Against Robert Mueller
text:
Paul Manafort, the former Trump campaign chairman indicted on tax and lobbying charges, lost his bid to restrict special counsel Robert Mueller through a civil lawsuit.
U.S. District Judge Amy Jackson on Friday dismissed a civil case Mr. Manafort had brought alleging that the Justice Department had exceeded its authority in establishing Mr. Mueller’s mandate last May. Mr. Manafort had also alleged that Mr. Mueller had overstepped his bounds in charging Mr. Manafort with crimes unrelated to Russian meddling the 2016 election,... RELATED VIDEO Executive Privilege: Can Trump Associates Remain Silent? WSJ's Shelby Holliday looks at whether "executive privilege" can protect Trump allies from speaking to Congress and Special Counsel Robert Mueller. Photo Illustration: Drew Evans/The Wall Street Journal.
